## Bio

Elizabeth Sharp studies cancer epidemiology and environmental exposures at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health. Her research focuses on environmental justice and carcinogenic exposure across the United States. She additionally collaborates as a research assistant at the Center for a Livable Future, addressing health issues through systematic reviews for industrial farming and communities that live nearby these industries.
